material.title: Medium
material.description: The tools, materials, and methods used for physical creation (e.g., digital painting, oil on canvas, charcoal).

material.title: Tools and Techniques
material.description: Specific tools and methods the artist employs within their chosen medium.

conceptual.title: Artistic Goals
conceptual.description: High-level intentions behind the artwork (e.g., emotional impact, narrative purpose, thematic focus).

conceptual.title: Style
conceptual.description: Visual aesthetics or approach chosen by the artist (e.g., abstract expressionism, realism, surrealism).

conceptual.title: Themes and Symbolism
conceptual.description: Central ideas, symbols, or metaphors explored in the artwork.

conceptual.title: Composition
conceptual.description: Layout and arrangement of visual elements within the piece (e.g., focal points, balance, perspective).

conceptual.title: Inspirations and References
conceptual.description: External or internal influences driving the artistâ€™s vision (e.g., historical references, nature, personal experiences).

conceptual.title: Emotions and Expression
conceptual.description: Emotional tones or expressions conveyed through the artwork (e.g., joy, rebellion, melancholy).
